short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Pitchfire Chrome extension allows you to promote your Pitchfire link in one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pitchfire is on a mission to burn cold prospecting to the ground. 

You hate getting it. They hate doing it. Join the movement to replace cold prospecting.

This is prospecting in 2024: 

Businesses grab your personal contact data from one of the 220 companies selling it, load you into sales engagement, and invade your time and space. 

The average person reading this will get prospected 780 times this year, yet only .4% of the prospecting people receive gets responded to positively. 

Armed with thousands of dollars in sales technology, training, and new AI tools, they will prospect you until the end of time.

Ignoring them will just increase your lead score, and the amount of interruptions you'll receive.

There's only one way to fight the machine. That's using Pitchfire. 

Join thousand of companies by sending all cold prospecting you receive to Pitchfire. Use our plugin, get prospected, and reply back with the Pitchfire chrome extension in one click.

Whether it's in your inbox or on LinkedIn. We reply back and route the seller to your Pitchfire profile, where they'll have to pay you and your company to get a response. 

1/85 of the people you send to Pitchfire will pay to pitch you, no meetings necessary. Get paid even if you aren't interested. 

The other 84, we thread the email and kick you out their sales automation in one click. 

Stop spam, keep your inbox clean, and stop 90% of cold interruptions and follow up from sales people. 

Everybody wins with Pitchfire.

 üî• No more follow ups.

 üî• No more invasion of your space.

 üî•No more free interruptions.

This is your new policy for cold outreach. Thousands of B2B professionals send every cold email to Pitchfire.

Get a cold email detected, or a cold Linkedin Message, and in one click REPLY WITH PITCHFIRE.

We reply, automatically pulling you out of most sales automation.

Once you've added the inbox plugin, you'll make a buyer profile.  
‚Äç
This is where we send sales people when you use the inbox plugin.

Instead of interrupting you where you work, we'll prevent prospecting before it happens by listing you in our B2B marketplace.
